summary: 11 in total finished, with the mha one nearly done, just waiting for another colour to be delivered to finish todoroki (and...
body:
11 in total finished, with the mha one nearly done, just waiting for another colour to be delivered to finish todoroki (and thanks to tumblrs 10 photo limit, you’re missing 2)

I’m happy so far, I’ve got so many to do before I can finish the project. But slowly but surely I’m getting there

blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

title: Shinsou Hitoshi +
description:
by Lidya_Schattenspiel

Decir que Hitoshi estaba abatido era la subestimación del siglo, era más cómo que sentía que arrastraba su propia alma mientras regresaba al orfanato.

No es cómo si tuviera alguien esperándole, ya fuera para consolarle o burlarse.

Suspiró.

Lo único que quería era dejarse caer en su diminuta e incómoda cama y no saber nada del mundo por al menos doce horas.

El universo tenía otros planes, como siempre.

-A-Aizawa-sensei-

//

Shinsou Hitoshi creía haber perdido toda oportunidad de cumplir sus sueños, pero la realidad es que sus oportunidades apenas comenzaban.

Words: 1899, Chapters: 3/?, Language: Español

  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

summary: Not the heros that we wanted but the vigilantes that we needed
title: Not the heros that we wanted but the vigilantes that we needed
description:
by MallowJum

His students have changed. It wasn’t a drastic change, no, it was more a graduate descent into… whatever this was. But they’ve changed. He couldn’t tell when it started. It just did. The change was clear.

So when Aizawa Shouta walked into classroom 1-A, he couldn’t be all that surprised when he found it empty.

Words: 9636, Chapters: 3/?, Language: English

  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto/Uraraka Ochako, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Other Relationship Tags to Be Added, maybe, but they’ll appear in later chapters - Relationship
  • Additional Tags: Vigilante Midoriya Izuku, Vigilante Todoroki Shouto, Vigilante Bakugou Katsuki, Basically the whole class 1-A, Father-Son Relationship, with Shinso and Aizawa, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Established Relationship, Class 1-A Shenanigans (My Hero Academia)
trail.content:
by MallowJum

His students have changed. It wasn’t a drastic change, no, it was more a graduate descent into… whatever this was. But they’ve changed. He couldn’t tell when it started. It just did. The change was clear.

So when Aizawa Shouta walked into classroom 1-A, he couldn’t be all that surprised when he found it empty.

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: (This isn’t pro-Mineta. I’m indifferent to him) How would you feel if Mineta got an upgrade in both character and Quirk?
question: (This isn’t pro-Mineta. I’m indifferent to him) How would you feel if Mineta got an upgrade in both character and Quirk?
answer: as long as he’s not a pervert anymore then it’d be fine. i dont think his quirk would need an upgrade, objectively speaking its fine as it is, its just the fact it’s associated with a gross guy who you KNOW would use it inappropriately.

reblog.comment: as long as he’s not a pervert anymore then it’d be fine. i dont think his quirk would need an upgrade, objectively speaking its fine as it is, its just the fact it’s associated with a gross guy who you KNOW would use it inappropriately.

blog.name: quirky-hero-imagines
blog.title: BNHA Imagines
blog.description:
Heyo! Another imagines and writing BNHA blog because there can never be enough💕 INBOX IS CLOSED [33]

Masterlist

FAQ Rules

summary: Iida with a s/o who can roller skate really well? Headcanons for the first time his s/o takes him skating. He sees them skate...
question: Iida with a s/o who can roller skate really well? Headcanons for the first time his s/o takes him skating. He sees them skate backwards, fast and do tricks. And maybe helps him skate during a slow song? Sorry if this is too much
answer:
Thank you for sending a request❤️

  • He is so excited and feels like he’s going to be quite good at it.
  • When he first sees your roller skating, he is honestly amazed. The speed you are going at and the way you move being something that he can’t help but admire.
  • You are having so much fun and barely notice Iida stumbling on his roller skates.
  • Iida attempts to mimic your speed, falling on his ass harshly.
  • You quickly skate towards him, not being able to hold your laugh as you do.
  • You help him up and offer to help him skate, which he accepts, feeling embarrassed.
  • With a bit of more falling and stumbling he starts getting the hang of it.
  • You feel proud as he skates a bit by himself.
  • When a slow song comes on he skates towards you and takes your hands in his. You can’t help but blush and giggle as he spins you around carefully and pulls you close.
  • You share kisses and smiles during your little skate dance until the song ends.
  • Afterwards you skate a bit more before taking a little break, getting some nice cold drinks together.
